body: I'm not sure if this is a function I'm too much of a dummy to find or if it's on the list of things yet-to-be, but is there a way to view content from only those guilds I've subscribed to? And/or is there a way to view content from only guilds of which I'm a guildmaster? Thanks in advance!
body_html: I'm not sure if this is a function I'm too much of a dummy to find or if it's on the list of things yet-to-be, but is there a way to view content from only those guilds I've subscribed to? And/or is there a way to view content from only guilds of which I'm a guildmaster? Thanks in advance!
title: Subscribed Guilds Feed?

author.bio:
Goodbye. https://ruqqus.com/+The_Cabal/post/d9y9/i-told-you-so-all-the

Remember: History repeats, and the unaware are doomed to repeat it.
author.bio_html:
Goodbye. https://ruqqus.com/+The_Cabal/post/d9y9/i-told-you-so-all-the

Remember: History repeats, and the unaware are doomed to repeat it.

body: I don't think there's a guildmaster feed, but your home feed (front page) is made up of only the guilds you've subscribed to.
body_html: I don't think there's a guildmaster feed, but your home feed (front page) is made up of only the guilds you've subscribed to.

guild.description:
The official guild for all things Ruqqus.

Rules:

💻 No promotion of other sites that aren't a fork of Ruqqus

🟪 Ruqqus-related only. This is a community dedicated to Ruqqus meta discussion. Content may involve technology and politics but must have ample context in Ruqqus.

📬 No spamming. Spamming comments or posts is not allowed.

😀 Be civil. Be nice. Harassment, trolling, and disruptive behavior is not allowed. Basically, don’t be a jerk.

📜 Follow Ruqqus ToS. This is a given.

For press releases, visit +RuqqusPress.

For updates and patch notes, visit +changelog.

For ideas and feedback, visit +BetaFeedback

For bug reports, visit +RuqqusBugs

body: Ah, that makes sense. So the difference between home and new/trending is that the later two pull from all guilds. Thank you!
body_html: Ah, that makes sense. So the difference between home and new/trending is that the later two pull from all guilds. Thank you!
